de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.tree.metrical
Interface MetricalNode<N extends MetricalNode<N,E>,E extends MetricalEntry>

Type Parameters:
N - the type of MetricalNode used in the metrical index
E - the type of MetricalEntry used in the metrical index
All Superinterfaces:
Externalizable, Node<N,E>, Page<N>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMTreeNode, MkAppTreeNode, MkCoPTreeNode, MkMaxTreeNode, MkTabTreeNode, MTreeNode
public interface MetricalNode<N extends MetricalNode<N,E>,E extends MetricalEntry>
extends Node<N,E>

Marker interface for objects that can be used as nodes in a metrical index. A metrical node can be a metrical directory node or a metrical leaf node.

Author:
Elke Achtert
